title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Kirby Air Riders is radically simple alternative to racing classics like Mario Kart
items.description: Simple mechanics and diverse modes turn Kirby Air Riders into a racing game to rival Mario Kart World, a fellow Nintendo Switch 2 exclusive.

items.title: Flu season could be nasty this winter

items.title: Friendsgiving 101: A history of the made-up holiday and how to celebrate it
items.description: The word's definition may be obvious, but Friendsgiving can mean different things to different people. Here are expert tips for how to celebrate it.

items.title: Person in custody after woman set on fire on CTA Blue Line train
items.description: A person was in custody Tuesday after a woman was set on fire while riding a CTA Blue Line in Chicago's Loop the night before.

items.title: Warning signs on Mexican beach declare area restricted by U.S.

items.title: Comey to challenge his indictment for "vindictive and selective" prosecution
items.description: In court Wednesday, former FBI Director James Comey will try to have the criminal charges against him dismissed.

items.title: Nicki Minaj supports contested Trump claim Christians being persecuted in Nigeria
items.description: The US-based Trinidadian rapper addressed the UN in New York alongside Trump administration officials, making claims that lack evidence.
